mapper.select: select id, user_name , real_name , sex, mobile, email, note, position_id positionId from t_user where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into t_user (id, user_name, real_name, sex, mobile, email, note, position_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{positionId,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.select:
select
from t_user a where
a.email like CONCAT('%', #{email}, '%') and
a.sex = #{sex}

select
from t_user a
and a.email like CONCAT('%', #{email}, '%')
and a.sex = #{sex}
